comment.author: 7517447@N07
comment._content: Manly Beach on 24th May 1906 www.manly.nsw.gov.au/IgnitionSuite/uploads/docs/Vincennes fact-sheet.pdf has details.

comment.author: 63385174@N06
comment._content: At high res, you can see the black spot just to the right of the ship is someone sliding down a rope to the sand. You can just make out the line of the rope.

comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: Here's Fred Leist's Sydney Mail illustration of the Vincennes at Manly (see pp. 1490-1491) - news.google.com/newspapers?id=sYNVAAAAIBAJ&sjid=zZUDA... ; the main Sydney Mail coverage had appeared in the previous week's issue.
